Typography Modules Utilities Layout

Buttons

Buttons are nice!

a.button 
<a class="button" href="#" role="button">a.button</a>
<button class="button" type="button">button.button</button>

Masthead

Howdy!

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

<div class="masthead">
  <div class="container u-compact u-text-center">
    <h1>Howdy!</h1>
    <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.</p>
  </div>
</div>

Link Link Link
Link Link Link 
<nav class="navbar" role="navigation">
  <div class="container">
    <nav class="nav navbar-nav" role="navigation">
      <a class="nav-link" href="#">Link</a>
      <a class="nav-link" href="#">Link</a>
      <a class="nav-link" href="#">Link</a>
    </nav>

    <nav class="nav navbar-nav navbar-right" role="navigation">
      <a class="nav-link" href="#">Link</a>
      <a class="nav-link" href="#">Link</a>
      <a class="nav-link" href="#">Link</a>
    </nav>
  </div>
</nav>

Streamer

The Modem Streamer is used for playing back and visualizing an audio stream. It supports playback of MP3, MP4/AAC, and OGG media streams and falls back to Flash when the Web Audio API is unsupported.

The Streamer can be used through the HTML5 data API (check out sections below for examples) or as a jQuery plugin (default options shown):

$("audio.streamer").streamer({
  stroke: {
    Width: 2
  , color: "#666"
  }
, classes: {
    wrapper: "streamer"
  , button: "streamer-button"
  }
, icons: {
    play: "ion-play"
  , pause: "ion-pause"
  }
})
<audio data-streamer>
  <source src="audio/example.ogg" type="audio/ogg">
  <source src="audio/example.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
</audio>

Within masthead

The Streamer can be put within a Masthead.

<div class="masthead">
  <div class="masthead-fill">
    <audio data-streamer>
      <source src="audio/example.ogg" type="audio/ogg">
      <source src="audio/example.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
    </audio>
  </div>
</div>
